author.html: A user of Jenkins since the early Hudson days, Justin has contributed to various plugins (including the Chatter Notifier Plugin) and has built a few other plugins such as the recently released Config-Driven Pipeline plugin as well as the Argus Notifier plugin. He’s used Jenkins in companies such as John Deere and Salesforce as well as during his time in Brazil at C.E.S.A.R. for some of their international clients. Justin enjoys software development, CI/CD, travel, music, and learning.
author.name: Justin Harringa
